Text:
yeah, it really is. 

Mule and Dr. John were touring together around this time, and there are several different dates in which Dr. John's people jumped in during various songs.

5 shows in total:

June 9 Charlotte, NC—Uptown Amphitheater (w/ Dr. John)
June 12 Myrtle Beach, SC—House of Blues (w/ Dr. John)
June 13 Raleigh, NC—Raleigh Amphitheater (w/ Dr. John)
June 14 Louisville, KY—Iroquois Amphitheater (w/ Dr. John)
June 17 Atlanta, GA—Chastain Music Park (w/ Dr. John)
